title: "What an AI-powered World Cup obscures"
excerpt: "Geopolitical intrigue and controversy. Messy soccer-world drama. Improbable first-half England goals. And, of course: A slate of hyped-up artificial intelligence applications. Wait, what? FIFA is touting an AI-powered decision-making system that will use sensors in the actual soccer ball to help determine calls."
